column4: when I dual boot XP and Ubuntu, do I have to 'allow' XP to use hardware from in Ubuntu?
yeah, I'm wondering if anyone can see what I'm saying? lol
No, not if they're both installed to the hard disk (as opposed to being in a VM).
Well, are you talking about from /within/ Windows?
Okay. What have you done so far? (Anything?)
Have you checked the wireless device?
